mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.deposit_agreement_id AS "depositAgreementId", a.contract_id AS "contractId", a.tenant_id AS "tenantId", a.lease_contract_id AS "leaseContractId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.agreement_change_id as "agreementChangeId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_contract_tenant( id, deposit_agreement_id, contract_id, tenant_id, lease_contract_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, agreement_change_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{depositAgreementId}, #{contractId}, #{tenantId}, #{leaseContractId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{agreementChangeId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_contract_tenant SET deposit_agreement_id = #{depositAgreementId}, contract_id = #{contractId}, tenant_id = #{tenantId}, lease_contract_id = #{leaseContractId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, agreement_change_id = #{agreementChangeId} WHERE id = #{id}
